Yulia Navalnaya says she and daughter Dasha are comforting each otherAlexei Navalny's wife Yulia said on Thursday that she and her daughter Dasha were together and comforting each other following the opposition politician's sudden death last week in a Russian penal colony. Ukraine says Russia has launched over 8,000 missiles, 4,630 drones during warRussia has launched more than 8,000 missiles and 4,630 drones at targets in Ukraine since its invasion two years ago, Ukrainian air force spokesperson Yuriy Ihnat said on Thursday.
